description:
Welcome to learning Hand Tools 101

This is an introductory course to common hand tools used both in workshops and around the home.

If you are new to hand tools, are looking to learn a bit more about hand tools or would like a clearer idea of the parts of hand tools and the different types, then this course is for you!

With easy to follow videos, with images showcasing the types compiled with clear english voiceover, hand tools 101 is an easy course to understand and follow.

With over 30minutes of video, and a quiz on your knowledge at the end, don't miss out on hand tools 101 for beginners!
title: Hand Tools 101 - A beginners guide to learning hand tools
